entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, referred to as 'Potter' and 'the Boy Who Scored'. He is on his way to a match.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: A student who is walking towards Harry with two girls. He seems to be sneering at Harry.

entities.name: the girl
entities.description: One of the girls who is with Malfoy. She gives an unwilling giggle when Harry stares at her.

entities.name: the girl's friend
entities.description: The other girl who is with Malfoy. She follows at a trot after Malfoy.

entities.name: the scho ol
entities.description: The school that Harry attends. It is mentioned as being absent.

entities.name: the match
entities.description: The event that Harry is on his way to. It is mentioned as being in danger of starting without him.

entities.name: the Chosen Captain
entities.description: A title given to Harry. It is mentioned as being something that people call him.

entities.name: the Boy Who Scored
entities.description: A title given to Harry. It is mentioned as being something that people call him.

relationships.description: Harry and Malfoy interact with each other. Harry demands to know where Malfoy is going, and Malfoy sneers at him.
Harry and the girl interact with each other. The girl gives an unwilling giggle when Harry stares at her.
Harry is on his way to the match. He is cutting it fine to get there on time.
Malfoy and the girl's friend interact with each other. They follow at a trot after Malfoy.
The rest of the school is absent. Harry is on his way to the match.
